title: I Don’t Want to Break off my Engagement… - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Criminals   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Misunderstandings   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Mikan.   蜜柑。
description:
The Duke’s daughter Tiarize is the fiancee of the Crown Prince.

But recently, an aggressive Baron’s daughter comes in full-throttle–ugh… how annoying!

The Baron’s daughter is a typical girl hated by other women. Moreover–

“She’s just getting a consultation?”

“Don’t worry? She’s like a sister to me.”

“My Fiancee, it seems that you’re jealous.”

“If it’s me, I won’t do something like that.”

Facing these 4 big combos, what is Tiarize’s next move–!?

Answer: nothing, because it’s too troublesome…!!>
